item.title: 货币套利使阿根廷米莱公司每月损失 20 亿美元
item.description: 农产品出口美元的暂时激增促使阿根廷人购买廉价的绿卡，这消耗了哈维尔-米莱伊总统的政府正在努力重建的储备。【原文：A temporary surge in farm-export dollars has prompted Argentines to purchase cheap greenbacks, draining the very reserves President Javier Milei’s government is trying to rebuild.】

item.title: 欧佩克+增加供应，沙特石油出口飙升至 18 个月新高
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯 9 月份的原油出口量跃升至 18 个月来的最高水平，这表明沙特在欧佩克+增产中所占的份额开始冲击全球市场。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s crude exports leaped to the highest for 18 months in September, a sign that the kingdom’s share of OPEC+ output hikes is starting to hit global markets.】

item.title: 赛勒有望免征 15%的公司税，战略上升
item.description: 由迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）创建的比特币财务公司 Strategy Inc. 表示将不再缴纳美国企业替代性最低税，该公司股价在周三的盘前交易中最高上涨了 3.7%。【原文：Strategy Inc. shares rose as much as 3.7% in premarket trading Wednesday after the Bitcoin treasury company founded by Michael Saylor said that it will no longer be subject to the US corporate alternative minimum tax.】

item.title: 谷歌通过新款摄像头、门铃和扬声器将双子座人工智能带入家庭
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司周三推出了一系列新的 Nest 品牌硬件，就在亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）举行自己的产品展示会的前一天，两家公司都在争夺将人工智能更深入地整合到整个智能家居中。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google introduced a range of new Nest-branded hardware on Wednesday, just a day after Amazon.com Inc. held its own product showcase, as both companies vie to more deeply integrate artificial intelligence throughout the smart home.】

item.title: 美元暴跌使外汇储备占比降至 30 年最低点
item.description: 外国中央银行库房中的美元比例达到了 1995 年以来的最低点，这一变化是由货币急剧下跌而不是持有量减少造成的。【原文：The proportion of dollars in the coffers of foreign central banks hit its lowest mark since 1995, a shift driven by a steep decline in the currency rather than a reduction in holdings.】

item.title: 元开始使用聊天机器人对话定位广告
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司不久将开始利用与其人工智能聊天机器人的互动，更有效地定制人们在 Facebook 和 Instagram 上看到的内容和广告。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will soon start using interactions with its AI chatbot to more effectively tailor the content and advertising that people see on Facebook and Instagram.】

item.title: 亚马逊针对注重价格的购物者推出杂货品牌
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）推出了一个自有品牌，提供一系列价格大多低于 5 美元的食品杂货，以吸引受通货膨胀影响的购物者。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. launched a private-label brand that offers a range of grocery items largely priced below $5 in a bid to attract inflation-stung shoppers.】

item.title: 印度家庭一年来价格压力有所缓解
item.description: 印度中央银行进行的调查显示，印度家庭预计，在当前价格上涨之后，未来三到十二个月的价格压力将趋于缓和。【原文：Indian households expect price pressures to moderate over the next three to 12 months after rising in the current period, according to surveys conducted by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: ADP 报告显示劳动力疲软，美国国债大涨
item.description: 在一项衡量私营部门就业的指标大幅下滑后，美国国债跳涨，导致交易商增加了对美联储今年降息的押注。【原文：US Treasuries jumped after a measure of private sector jobs plummeted, leading traders to add to bets on interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve this year.】

item.title: 数据调整后的 ADP 报告显示美国企业裁员 3.2 万人
item.description: 美国公司 9 月份的薪资出乎意料地下降，至少部分原因是数据分析出现了问题。【原文：Payrolls at US companies unexpectedly dropped in September, due at least in part to issues with data analysis.】

item.title: 中国电动车市场竞争激烈，比亚迪销量下滑
item.description: 电动汽车巨头比亚迪公司的月销售额出现了18个多月以来的首次下滑，尽管该公司的国内竞争对手在中国市场的激烈竞争中报告了强劲的增长。【原文：Electric vehicle juggernaut BYD Co.’s monthly sales fell for the first time in more than 18 months even as the company’s domestic rivals reported strong gains amid fierce competition in the Chinese market.】

item.title: 谷歌欧洲区负责人呼吁修改 "有问题 "的欧盟规则
item.description: 谷歌在欧洲的最高负责人表示，欧洲大陆应该简化复杂而相互冲突的人工智能和技术规则，因为硅谷最大的公司抱怨这些规则影响了他们在欧盟开展业务的能力。【原文：Google’s top executive in Europe said the continent should simplify complex and conflicting rules on artificial intelligence and technology as Silicon Valley’s biggest companies gripe about their impact on their ability to do business in the EU.】

item.title: 土耳其 Vestel 公司正在商谈将里拉贷款换成硬通货
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，土耳其 Vestel Elektronik 公司正在与贷款机构商谈对其部分贷款进行再融资，因为这家家电制造商正在与两位数的利率和高杠杆率作斗争。【原文：Turkey’s Vestel Elektronik is in talks with lenders to refinance some of its loans, as the home-appliance maker struggles with double-digit interest rates and high leverage, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Oura 推出价值 500 美元的陶瓷智能戒指
item.description: 芬兰智能戒指制造商 Oura Health Oy 宣布推出价格更高的陶瓷版最新产品，采用与珠宝首饰相关的材料，以取悦女性占多数的客户群。【原文：Oura Health Oy, the Finnish smart ring maker, announced a pricier ceramic version of its latest model, adopting a material associated with jewelry in a bid to please a majority-female customer base.】

item.title: 枫树园入股 Prep Network，私募股权投资推动青少年体育发展
item.description: 私募股权投资公司继续进军美国青少年体育领域，与枫树园资本合伙人公司（Maple Park Capital Partners）签署了一项协议，该公司旗下的 Prep Network 是一个专注于大学运动员招募和现场活动的平台。【原文：Private equity is continuing its push into American youth sports with Prep Network, a platform focused on collegiate athlete recruitment and live events, signing a deal with Maple Park Capital Partners.】

item.title: 智利矿难导致经济活动下降
item.description: 智利 8 月份的经济活动按月下滑，这反映出世界第一大产铜国一个主要矿山暂时停止产出的事故所造成的影响。【原文：Chile’s economic activity tumbled on the month in August, reflecting the impact of an accident that temporarily halted output at a major mine in the world’s top copper-producing nation.】

item.title: 石油的沙特看跌已被中国看跌所取代
item.description:
中国政府一直在囤积廉价原油作为战略储备。【原文：

item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：As central banks keep cutting interest rates, investors should lock in “attractive bond yields” with fixed income returns potentially eclipsing cash, says Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 我会赔钱吗？信贷买家转向盈亏平衡点寻找线索
item.description: 由于公司债券利差为投资者提供的风险补偿是多年来最少的，一些投资者开始更密切地关注另一个指标，以证明他们的购买狂潮是合理的。【原文：With corporate bond spreads offering investors the least compensation for risk in years, some are beginning to look more closely at another metric to justify their buying spree.】

item.title: CoreWeave 在一系列新交易中赢得华尔街青睐
item.description: 在经历了几个月的怀疑之后，华尔街开始对 CoreWeave 公司产生好感，因为一系列新的商业交易缓解了人们对这家亏损的计算机服务提供商的担忧。【原文：After months of skepticism, Wall Street is warming up to CoreWeave Inc. as a series of new business deals eases concerns about the money losing provider of computing services.】

item.title: 投资者为何对黄金爱不释手？
item.description: 几个世纪以来，黄金一直是政治和经济不稳定时期的避风港资产。黄金作为一种可靠的高价值商品，可以方便地运输并在任何地方出售，当其他一切都处于动荡之中时，黄金给人一种安全感。【原文：For centuries, gold has been the go-to haven asset in times of political and economic uncertainty. Its status as a reliably high-value commodity that can be transported easily and sold anywhere offers a sense of safety when everything else is in turmoil.】

item.title: 英国央行贝利对稳定币未来作用的怀疑态度有所缓和
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）周三表示对稳定币的态度较为温和，称数字货币可以推动支付领域的创新，并与当前的金融体系共存。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey signaled a softer approach toward stablecoins on Wednesday, saying that the digital currency could drive innovations in payments and co-exist with the current financial system.】

item.title: 北约基金将借鉴 Covid 的策略应对俄罗斯威胁
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，马克-伯根（Mark Bergen）将从欧洲最新的军事技术聚会上发回一篇报道，因为政治气氛变得更加黑暗。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Mark Bergen sends a dispatch from Europe’s latest military tech gathering as the political mood gets darker.】

item.title: 企业为特朗普关税出谋划策，贸易游说活动蓬勃发展
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统喜欢吹嘘美国政府从关税中赚了多少钱。华盛顿的贸易说客们可能会对特朗普政策对他们业务的影响感到类似的眩晕。【原文：President Donald Trump likes to boast about how much money the US government is making from tariffs. Washington trade lobbyists might feel a similar giddiness about the impact of his policies on their business.】

item.description:
这家健身公司对其设备进行了人工智能改造。【原文：

The fitness company gives its equipment an artificial intelligence overhaul.

】

item.title: 特朗普对签证规则的拟议修改遭到芯片行业的抨击
item.description: 半导体行业领导人警告特朗普政府，拟议中的签证收紧规定有可能导致重要的人才库缩水，并破坏美国扩大芯片制造业的努力。【原文：Semiconductor industry leaders are warning the Trump administration that a proposed tightening of visa rules risks shrinking a vital talent pool and undermining efforts to expand chip manufacturing in the US.】

item.title: DIY 指数化热潮向零售大众开放，最低限额为 1,000 美元
item.description: 公共控股公司（Public Holdings Inc.【原文：Public Holdings Inc. is offering retail investors the chance to build their own bespoke index with built-in tax advantages for a minimum investment of $1,000.】

item.title: 布朗大学和西北大学捐赠基金转向二级市场
item.description: 布朗大学和西北大学的首席投资官们正在转向二级市场，为他们的私人资产寻求不断增加的流动性，尽管他们对定价仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Chief investment officers at Brown and Northwestern universities are turning to the secondary markets to tap into rising liquidity for their private assets, although they remain cautious over pricing.】

item.title: 印度央行行长认为收益率有下调空间，印度债券上涨
item.description: 印度储备银行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）发出收益率有下降空间的信号后，印度债券创下一个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Indian bonds rose by the most in a month after Reserve Bank of India Governor Sanjay Malhotra signaled room for yields to fall.】
